Package de.tum.cit.ase.maze.GameComponents

Class Player

java.lang.Object
de.tum.cit.ase.maze.GameComponents.GameEntities
de.tum.cit.ase.maze.GameComponents.Player
public class Player extends GameEntities
Represents the player in a maze runner game. This class handles the player's properties such as movement, animation, shooting, and collision detection.

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 position)
      Constructs a new Player with a specified initial position. Initializes the player's animation sheets and sets the default direction and speed.
      Parameters:
      position - The initial position of the player in the game world.

  • Method Details

    • Key_Release

      public void Key_Release(int keystroke)
      Handles the event when a key is released. Stops the player's movement in the corresponding direction.
      Parameters:
      keystroke - The keycode of the released key.

    • Key_Pressed

      public void Key_Pressed(int keystroke)
      Handles the event when a key is pressed. Starts the player's movement in the corresponding direction and handles shooting.
      Parameters:
      keystroke - The keycode of the pressed key.

    • update

      public void update(Maps maps)
      Updates the player's position and animation based on the current direction of movement. Checks for collisions with walls and ensures the player does not move outside the map boundaries.
      Parameters:
      maps - The game map containing information about walls and other obstacles.

    • shoot

      public void shoot(List<GameEntities> objects)
      Handles the shooting mechanism of the player. Creates a new bullet entity and plays the shooting sound effect.
      Parameters:
      objects - The list of game entities to which the new bullet will be added.

    • box

      public BoundingBox box()
      Returns the bounding box of the player for collision detection.
      Overrides:
      box in class GameEntities
      Returns:
      The bounding box of the player.

    • draw

      public void draw(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Batch batch)
      Draws the player on the screen using the current animation frame.
      Overrides:
      draw in class GameEntities
      Parameters:
      batch - The batch used to draw the player's texture on the screen.
